aboutpara:
Chun-Ju Tao is a Computer Engineering masterâ€™s student at NYU with a 3.78 GPA and a solid foundation in software development, DevOps, and AI applications. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, C#, Go, and 
PostgreSQL, he has successfully delivered impactful projects across diverse industries. Notable accomplishments include optimizing microservices with Docker and AWS ECS, creating a material management system for a government organization, and developing AI-driven solutions like an NLP-based news presenter. Chun-Ju has demonstrated leadership by implementing Agile practices, enhancing team efficiency during rapid growth, and winning multiple awards for technical innovation. His achievements reflect a commitment to driving operational excellence and delivering scalable, modern solutions.
